problems.title: Do You Know These Problems in Your Dental Practice?
problems.subtitle: These typical challenges cost you patients and revenue daily

missed_calls.title: Missed Calls After Hours
missed_calls.description: The Problem: Every unanswered call after 6 PM potentially means a lost new patient. Studies show that 70% of patients call competitors directly when unable to reach a dental practice.

staff_shortage.title: Chronic Staff Shortages
staff_shortage.description: The Problem: Your well-trained reception team is permanently overloaded with repetitive phone calls about standard questions, opening hours and simple appointment requests.

callback_delays.title: Long Waiting Times for Callbacks
callback_delays.description: The Problem: New patients often have to wait days for callbacks - a fatal experience in times of instant service. Each day of waiting reduces your conversion rate by up to 30%.

unnoticed_cancellations.title: Unnoticed Appointment Cancellations
unnoticed_cancellations.description: The Problem: Cancellations on the answering machine often go unnoticed for hours. Valuable treatment appointments remain unused while other patients wait weeks.

language_barriers.title: Language Barriers
language_barriers.description: The Problem: In multilingual cities, valuable patient potential is lost because inquiries in Turkish, Arabic or other languages cannot be handled professionally.

appointment_chaos.title: Appointment Chaos
appointment_chaos.description: The Problem: Manual appointment management leads to double bookings and scheduling conflicts. The result: stressed teams, angry patients and image damage.

high_no_show.title: High No-Show Rate
high_no_show.description: The Problem: Without systematic reminders, the no-show rate is 15-20%. That's several unused treatment units daily while waiting lists are full.

inefficient_time.title: Inefficient Time Distribution
inefficient_time.description: The Problem: Your specialized staff spends 60-70% of working time on simple phone calls instead of value-adding patient care. You pay specialist salaries for phone service.

lost_emergency.title: Lost Emergency Appointments
lost_emergency.description: The Problem: Patients with acute tooth pain call multiple dental practices and choose the first one that answers immediately. If your phone is busy, these valuable emergency and acute patients are irretrievably lost.

solution.title: The Solution: Your Intelligent Dental Practice Assistant
solution.subtitle: Our AI agent with deep dental expertise immediately handles all patient inquiries - by phone and chat on your website.
